entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as the one who occupied with the kettle and stole Uncle Vernon's grapefruit. He is described as someone who talks at the door and laughs.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as the owner of the grapefruit that Dudley stole. He is also described as answering curtly to someone talking at the door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who heard Uncle Vernon answering curtly and got up to follow him into the living room.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as setting down the teapot on the table and looking curiously around to see where Uncle Vernon had got to.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon called Harry into the living room.
